attributes.action: Introduce legislation to make bicycle manufacturers fit lights as standard equipment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many cyclists ride at night without lights, endangering themselves and others. If manufacturers were forced to fit lights to all new bicycles using solar or Faraday technology (dispensing with disposable batteries) lives would be saved. After all, you wouldn't buy a car without lights, would you?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
